description: Police say two teenage boys were arrested on suspicion of causing grievous bodily harm.
title: Arrests after 16-year-old boy is stabbed
title_page: Oadby: Arrests after 16-year-old boy is stabbed during fight - BBC News
maintext:
Two teenagers have been arrested after a 16-year-old boy was stabbed.
Leicestershire Police said officers were called to the area of Forest Rise, Eden Close and Eden Road in Oadby, at about 15:30 GMT on Monday following a report of a fight.
The force said the injured boy was found to have a stab wound which was not life-threatening or life-changing.
Police said two other boys, aged 16 and 15, were arrested on suspicion of causing grievous bodily harm with intent and later released on bail.
